labels.analysis: The MCP Server specializes in creating, reading, manipulating, and managing Microsoft Word documents through a standardized interface. It offers a wide range of tools for document creation, editing, formatting, and protection, as well as advanced features like footnotes, endnotes, and conversion to PDF. The server streamlines Word document workflows, making it suitable for applications requiring document processing, automation, and integrations with AI assistants. Its functionality primarily revolves around document management and editing, with a focus on Microsoft Word.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "File Management" is chosen because the server's core functionality revolves around managing, creating, and manipulating Word documents, which are files. The secondary label "Content Creation" is appropriate as the server enables the creation and enhancement of documents, a form of content. While "AI/ML Tools" could be considered due to AI assistant integration, the server's primary functionality is more tied to file/document operations.

tools.name: create_document
tools.description:
Create a new Word document with optional metadata.
    
    Args:
        filename: Name of the document to create (with or without .docx extension)
        title: Optional title for the document metadata
        author: Optional author for the document metadata

tools.name: copy_document
tools.description:
Create a copy of a Word document.
    
    Args:
        source_filename: Path to the source document
        destination_filename: Optional path for the copy. If not provided, a default name will be generated.

tools.name: get_document_info
tools.description:
Get information about a Word document.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document

tools.name: get_document_text
tools.description:
Extract all text from a Word document.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document

tools.name: get_document_outline
tools.description:
Get the structure of a Word document.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document

tools.name: list_available_documents
tools.description:
List all .docx files in the specified directory.
    
    Args:
        directory: Directory to search for Word documents

tools.name: add_paragraph
tools.description:
Add a paragraph to a Word document.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document
        text: Paragraph text
        style: Optional paragraph style name

tools.name: add_heading
tools.description:
Add a heading to a Word document.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document
        text: Heading text
        level: Heading level (1-9, where 1 is the highest level)

tools.name: add_picture
tools.description:
Add an image to a Word document.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document
        image_path: Path to the image file
        width: Optional width in inches (proportional scaling)

tools.name: add_table
tools.description:
Add a table to a Word document.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document
        rows: Number of rows in the table
        cols: Number of columns in the table
        data: Optional 2D array of data to fill the table

tools.name: add_page_break
tools.description:
Add a page break to the document.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document

tools.name: delete_paragraph
tools.description:
Delete a paragraph from a document.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document
        paragraph_index: Index of the paragraph to delete (0-based)

tools.name: search_and_replace
tools.description:
Search for text and replace all occurrences.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document
        find_text: Text to search for
        replace_text: Text to replace with

tools.name: create_custom_style
tools.description:
Create a custom style in the document.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document
        style_name: Name for the new style
        bold: Set text bold (True/False)
        italic: Set text italic (True/False)
        font_size: Font size in points
        font_name: Font name/family
        color: Text color (e.g., 'red', 'blue')
        base_style: Optional existing style to base this on

tools.name: format_text
tools.description:
Format a specific range of text within a paragraph.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document
        paragraph_index: Index of the paragraph (0-based)
        start_pos: Start position within the paragraph text
        end_pos: End position within the paragraph text
        bold: Set text bold (True/False)
        italic: Set text italic (True/False)
        underline: Set text underlined (True/False)
        color: Text color (e.g., 'red', 'blue', etc.)
        font_size: Font size in points
        font_name: Font name/family

tools.name: format_table
tools.description:
Format a table with borders, shading, and structure.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document
        table_index: Index of the table (0-based)
        has_header_row: If True, formats the first row as a header
        border_style: Style for borders ('none', 'single', 'double', 'thick')
        shading: 2D list of cell background colors (by row and column)

tools.name: protect_document
tools.description:
Add password protection to a Word document.

    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document
        password: Password to protect the document with

tools.name: unprotect_document
tools.description:
Remove password protection from a Word document.

    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document
        password: Password that was used to protect the document

tools.name: add_footnote_to_document
tools.description:
Add a footnote to a specific paragraph in a Word document.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document
        paragraph_index: Index of the paragraph to add footnote to (0-based)
        footnote_text: Text content of the footnote

tools.name: add_endnote_to_document
tools.description:
Add an endnote to a specific paragraph in a Word document.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document
        paragraph_index: Index of the paragraph to add endnote to (0-based)
        endnote_text: Text content of the endnote

tools.name: convert_footnotes_to_endnotes_in_document
tools.description:
Convert all footnotes to endnotes in a Word document.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document

tools.name: customize_footnote_style
tools.description:
Customize footnote numbering and formatting in a Word document.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document
        numbering_format: Format for footnote numbers (e.g., "1, 2, 3", "i, ii, iii", "a, b, c")
        start_number: Number to start footnote numbering from
        font_name: Optional font name for footnotes
        font_size: Optional font size for footnotes (in points)

tools.name: get_paragraph_text_from_document
tools.description:
Get text from a specific paragraph in a Word document.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document
        paragraph_index: Index of the paragraph to retrieve (0-based)

tools.name: find_text_in_document
tools.description:
Find occurrences of specific text in a Word document.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document
        text_to_find: Text to search for in the document
        match_case: Whether to match case (True) or ignore case (False)
        whole_word: Whether to match whole words only (True) or substrings (False)

tools.name: convert_to_pdf
tools.description:
Convert a Word document to PDF format.
    
    Args:
        filename: Path to the Word document
        output_filename: Optional path for the output PDF. If not provided, 
                         will use the same name with .pdf extension

server_info_crawled.name: Office Word Document Server
server_info_crawled.author: @GongRzhe/Office-Word-MCP-Server
server_info_crawled.overview: Enable AI assistants to create, read, and manipulate Microsoft Word documents through a standardized interface. Perform rich document editing operations such as adding content, formatting text and tables, merging documents, and applying document protection. Streamline Word document workflows by integrating powerful document management and formatting capabilities into your AI applications.

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@GongRzhe/Office-Word-MCP-Server/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
